Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Arrow: Yeah. I know where we can "get" a ship.

Shortly thereafter, Deemos =
pushed the doors open with a loud thud. He walks in slowly and walked right=
 up to Arrow's face.

Deemos: Remember we made a truce last time we met.

A=
rrow: Yeah. You killed Perplex anyway.

Deemos smiled.

Deemos: It was a ve=
ry good old friend of mine who killed Perplex.

Arrow: I killed the kid.

D=
eemos: Oh?

Arrow: The male. Ripped the spark out of his chest.

Deemos: I =
underestimated you, then.

Arrow: This is Diesel.

Deemos: Greetings.

Arro=
w: Diesel, this is the Deemos. The leader of the former group the Chosen Ma=
fia.

Deemos smiled with the intentions of a demon dreaming, or something l=
ike that...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: RoboRick007
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 2:35 AM
  Subject: Re: Se=
cret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel looks shocked when Deemos' voice=
 comes through the comm.

  Diesel: It did... it worked. I guess now we jus=
t wait for him. Then it's off too Earth!
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: =
Monday, August 12, 2002 1:59 AM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    Arro=
w: I don't think that'll work, it could be a very old listing.

    (Meanwh=
ile)

    Deemos (thinking): If someone wants to contact me, they'd probabl=
y look up my old number.

    He types his old number into his commlink and=
 waits.

    (Meanwhile)

    Arrow dials the number.

    Deemos over comm=
 unit: Hello. No time to waste, location.

    Arrow reads off the address =
of the place. Since that it was so secret, I won't tell it here. (I don't k=
now it)

    Arrow: It worked...

      ----- Original Message -----
      =
From: RoboRick007
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Monday, Augu=
st 12, 2002 1:28 AM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel :=
 :

      Diesel tries to think of a way to reach Deemos. He finally comes =
up with something, but a long shot.

      Diesel: Well I wouldn't know. We=
 can try the listings for his comm channel. A bot like him probably isn't l=
isted, but it's all I can think to do.

      Diesel sits at a computer and=
 starts to search through records. After about ten minutes he comes up with=
 it. He stands back from the comp.

      Diesel: Well I'll be a Sharkticon=
, here it is. Try this channel.

      He points to the list on the screen.=

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Iron Man Lives Again! =

        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 =
1:14 AM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        Arrow: The message s=
ent asked for another person. whom I recognize. His name is Deemos, and he =
used to be both an ally and an enemy of mine at different times. He's deadl=
y, but so are we.

        He crosses his arms.

        Arrow: I used to k=
now alot of others, but I broke off from them a bit back. The one named Air=
bomber got very jealous of me. He was only greedy and an egomaniac, however=
. Where could we find Deemos? I've long since forgotten his signal...

    =
      ----- Original Message -----
          From: RoboRick007
          To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:56 AM
 =
         Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          : : Diesel : :

         =
 He looked at Arrow. He eyes flashed and gave a very evil sense. You knew t=
hat he had a maniacle smile under his faceplate.

          Diesel: You kno=
w it. However we should take care of some things here first. If we go to jo=
in Razor, we may need more men. Know of anyone?
            ----- Original =
Message ----- 
            From: Degenerate 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
            Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:39 AM
            Su=
bject: Re: Secret Messages


            OOC: If I can be serious for a min=
ute, this group is the epitome of seriousness and does not deserve to be su=
bjected to a silly post. Prepare for the rebirth of the original rookie mon=
ster of NBW.

            BIC:

            Arrow hears Diesel's voice. His=
 back was turned to his old ally. He tries to remember where he had seen Di=
esel before. Memories of his past come flying back to him. They return easi=
ly when he needs them enough, he finds, the Radicons hadn't done a very goo=
d job of erasing these memories. He slowly turns around, recalling Diesel's=
 place in his tumultuous life.

            Arrow: Ah, yes, Diesel, the mes=
sage. It has been a long time, hasn't it? Shall we get to business immediat=
ely?

            Arrow could barely remember Razor. He didn't hold anythin=
g against the Radicons for damaging his memory so badly. They did what they=
 had to, Arrow had attempted to kill them.

            Arrow: So, what now=
? Do we head to Earth?
            ~~~~~
            Deemos was sitting in =
a meeting, bored.

            Leader: Gentlemen, we must all band together=
 and stop this menace! We cannot allow this other club to gain the upper ha=
nd! We truly have the best flag! The others will pay for their disagreeance=
!

            Deemos: What kind of club is this? And is disagreeance a wor=
d?

            Leader: This is not a club, this is a council. It's the Cou=
ncil of Evil. And yes, Disagreeance is a word.

            Deemos: No, you=
 said "We cannot allow this other club to gain the upper hand," apparently =
if there is this "other" club, this is a club.

            Leader: See her=
e--

            Deemos: I was the one who held a council. We were the Mafi=
a, the most imposing group to ever exist save for the Alliance.

          =
  Leader: Sir, I'm certain I don't know what you are talking about.

      =
      Deemos: If this so called council is so evil, why is it that we are n=
ot attacking, and why is it that we are not spilling blood.

            Le=
ader: Mech fluid.

            Deemos: It's the same thing. I've spilled al=
ot of it.

            Leader: Well, sir, you see, we like to bide our time=
, and then--

            Deemos: Then you burn someone else's flag. Then t=
hey come and burn yours. You don't know what violence is. I am the epitome =
of violence. The innovator. The only individuals I've seen you destroy are =
your own comrades. Not that it's a bad thing to destroy your comrades, I've=
 destroyed plenty of lackeys in my time.

            Leader: I think you'r=
e only saying this because you've joined another council! I think you need =
to be dealt with! You're nothing more than a vicious traitor!

            =
Deemos: So you guys are going to deal with me? Put me away? Send me to the =
great junkyard in the sky?

            Member: Junkyard?

            Lead=
er: Enough of this, get him!

            Deemos stands up. A member sittin=
g right next to him stands up as well, but he's too slow and too dumb. Deem=
os puts a pistol to his mid section quickly and fires. Several bolts rip th=
rough the robot, creating several flashes and one hole leading all the way =
through. The unlucky one falls to the ground. Deemos' trigger finger quickl=
y flicks a switch on the utility pistol as he swivels it around towards ano=
ther member who was raising a rifle. Deemos moves forward a single step and=
 barely dodges a shot heading his way. He fires the pistol and a barrage of=
 5 inch long steel nails are fired at rapid speed, piercing the head of the=
 attackee and tearing off large chunks. Deemos quickly spins around, flicki=
ng a switch once more and he fires. Several shots hit the robot who had fir=
ed at him, cutting down the bot who shocked at Deemos' speed and severing o=
ne of his arms and his head. The cut down fellow's head rolled across the f=
loor as the body dropped.

            Leader: Idiots!

            Deemos =
quickly fired a few pellets on the ground, which erupted into tall flames. =
He was hidden from sight. A shot emerges from behind the flames, passing De=
emos' head by inches.

            Leader: Did you hear that? I think I got=
 him.

            A grenade flies out from behind the fire and rolls near =
the Leader of the council's feet.

            (Cut to)

            Deemos=
 runs through the halls of the building as a massive explosion erupts behin=
d him, detonating the room he previously occupied. It was no problem escapi=
ng from these buffoons, he thought as he exited the building, laughing at t=
he fact that he destroyed about 20 or so more lives. He decided to check hi=
s messages. His commlink system was designed to capture messages and hold t=
hem for a later hearing. He had two of these. He activated the first one.

=
            Message: Hey, buddy, I got some of those (buzz) were trying to =
get. It was (buzz) so, you wanna (buzz) we've--

            Deemos deletes=
 the message quickly. A wrong number and a bad commlink. He activates the n=
ext message. He listens to the code carefully then plays it back again. He =
plays it back a third time.

            Deemos: Hmm. Maybe. This sounds li=
ke the old code.

            He activates his jets and flies, planning to =
answer this message addressing him and the the one that he knew well back o=
n Earth, Arrow. It had been a long time since he had come in contact with R=
azor. He was ready for anything...

              ----- Original Message --=
---
              From: RoboRick007
              To: Neo Beast Wars
      =
        Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2002 11:03 PM
              Subject: Secre=
t Messages


              : : Diesel : :

              On Cybertron a fue=
l tanker truck drives down an elevated street, before pulling into what loo=
ked like an abandon building. The black and silver truck transformes into a=
 menacing Cybertronian. A Decepticon too be exact. He turns to the others i=
n the building.

              Diesel: Hey Arrow, did you pick up that inco=
ded transmission that came through the Transwarp portal?

              He =
awaits a response.

              : : Wolfenstein : :

              While =
he follows Megatron deeper into the base. His comm system picks up a transm=
ission. However it is heavily incoded so he cannot listen too it now. He se=
ts his comm unit to work on it, and continues on.

          You=
r use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



     =
   Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


=

      Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.=
 



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Servic=
e. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of =
Service.
